tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_usage_2021 (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_usage_2022 (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_trends (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE time_periods (
  time_period_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_readings (
  reading_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  time_period_id UUID REFERENCES time_periods(time_period_id),
  energy_value FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumers (
  consumer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
  consumption_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  consumer_id UUID REFERENCES energy_consumers(consumer_id),
  reading_id UUID REFERENCES energy_readings(reading_id),
  consumption_value FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Energy_Usage_Recordings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Daily_Energy_Totals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    total_energy FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Monthly_Energy_Averages (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    month DATE,
    average_energy FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Yearly_Energy_Summary (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    year INT,
    total_energy_consumed FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Energy_Trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR,
    trend_description TEXT
)
